edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor.data.metadata

Class FileMetadata<K extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor.data.metadata.FileMetadata<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type of its partitions.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalFileMetadata, RemoteFileMetadata

    public abstract class FileMetadata<K extends Serializable>
extends Object
    This class represents a metadata for a Block. The writer and reader determine the status of a file block (such as accessibility, how many bytes are written, etc.) by using this metadata.

    • Method Detail

      • reservePartition

        public abstract PartitionMetadata<K> reservePartition(K key,
                                                      int partitionSize,
                                                      long elementsTotal)
                                               throws IOException
        Reserves the region for a partition and get the metadata for the partition. When a writer reserves the region (or space) of a file for a data partition, other writers will write their data after the region. Also, the readers will judge a data partition available after the partition is committed.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the partition.
        partitionSize - the size of the partition.
        elementsTotal - the number of elements in the partition.
        Returns:
        the PartitionMetadata having all given information, the partition offset, and the index.
        Throws:
        IOException - if fail to append the partition metadata.

      • commitPartitions

        public abstract void commitPartitions(Iterable<PartitionMetadata> partitionMetadataToCommit)
        Notifies that some partitions are written.
        Parameters:
        partitionMetadataToCommit - the metadata of the partitions to commit.

      • getPartitionMetadataIterable

        public abstract Iterable<PartitionMetadata<K>> getPartitionMetadataIterable()
                                                                     throws IOException
        Gets a iterable containing the partition metadata of corresponding block.
        Returns:
        the iterable containing the partition metadata.
        Throws:
        IOException - if fail to get the iterable.

      • deleteMetadata

        public abstract void deleteMetadata()
                             throws IOException
        Deletes the metadata.
        Throws:
        IOException - if fail to delete.

      • isPartitionCommitPerWrite

        public final boolean isPartitionCommitPerWrite()
        Returns:
        whether commit every partition write or not.

      • commitBlock

        public abstract void commitBlock()
        Notifies that all writes are finished for the block corresponding to this metadata.
